rules_text:
Haste
When Life of the Party enters, create two Souvenir tokens. [i](They're artifacts with “Whenever a creature deals damage to an opponent, you may sacrifice this to put a +1/+1 counter on it.”)[/i]
Whenever Life of the Party attacks, you may sacrifice a permanent. If you do, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until end of turn.
